main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed for a short period of time, but its true nature could not be determined with certainty.
interesting points: The object was observed from the ground in Nauvoo, Illinois on January 9, 1957 at around 9:00 AM.
The observation lasted for approximately 10 minutes, and the object was seen continuously during that time.
The object was described as solid, sharply outlined, and brighter than a shiny paperclip.
The object was reported to make a sound like bees and had a metallic red color.
A hand-drawn sketch depicts the object as a spacecraft-like craft about 100 feet in diameter.
